This popular Fitbit is $80 off, and comes with a $20 Amazon credit - here's how to cash in
Follow ZDNET: Add us as a preferred source on Google.
If you've been in the market for an affordable smartwatch, every Fitbit Versa 4 model is on sale for a competitive $120 -- $80 off the regular price. Plus, a sweet $20 credit saves you even more. Fitbit is one of the staple fitness and smartwatch brands, and has been around since years before many of its competitors hit the market.
Also: Best early Black Friday sales
As such, the Versa 4 is not the newest model, but it is definitely a popular one. It has over 16,000 reviews on Amazon, with a 4.5 star rating. At Walmart, it's earned a similar 4.3 star rating, with reviewers calling out the watch's feature set relative to price, and Fitbit's app, which is one of the better fitness trackers.
At Amazon right now, you can score an extra $20 credit to your account totally free when you purchase the Fitbit Versa 4 for 40% off. This is one of the best prices we've seen for the Versa 4. During Prime Day, it was available for $70 off, so this $80 off offer (plus free $20 credit) takes the cake. The best part is that all three color options have this same offer.
Also: The best smartwatches of 2025
So what kinds of features are we talking here? All the basic health metrics are covered in the Versa 4: 24/7 heart rate, GPS, sleep tracking and daily readiness scores, 40+ exercise modes, stress management, menstrual health tracking, mindfulness and meditation content, and more.
Part of this is due to the maturity of the Fitbit app, which has been around long enough to improve on many of these features. The physical form of the watch follows suit. It's modest but durable, measuring 40.5mm by 40.5mm by 12.3mm with rounded-off corners.
The Versa 4 sports a responsive full-color touchscreen and, on the solid aluminum surround, a touch-sensitive button. The heart rate sensor on the underside, and although Fitbit doesn't use IP ratings, the company says that both devices are water-resistant up to a depth of 50m.
Also: Best Black Friday smartwatch and fitness tracker deals
In terms of battery life, the Versa 4 will easily get up to six days, but with continuous GPS on, it only lasts around 12 hours straight -- something to be mindful of if you plan on taking the watch off-grid for an extended period of time. In that sense, this is better for outdoor activities in the neighborhood or at the gym; I wouldn't bring it camping for multiple days at a time.
The Versa 4 has plenty of smartphone integration, including call, text, and app notifications, plus tons of clock faces for added personalization. Other than that, you can take on-wrist Bluetooth calls, utilize the built-in Alexa, Google Wallet, and Maps.
When you buy the Versa 4, you'll also get a free six-month membership to Fitbit's premium plan, which includes personalized insights, advanced analytics, and guided programs. The watch comes in three colors: Black, Pink Sand, and Waterfall Blue, which is more of a blue-gray.

If you score this offer, your promotional credit will be automatically added to your account 30 days after shipment of your Versa 4.
When that happens, you'll receive an e-mail from Amazon that indicates the dollar amount of the promotional credit and that the dollar amount of the credit has been added to your customer account. You'll also get details on how to redeem your credit. This offer doesn't apply to digial content and is only availabe while supplies last. Plus, your $20 credit expires at 11:59 p.m. PT on March 5, so you'll need to spend it before.
